name: Let me out (itch) (Kamarada)
description:
Let me out

Revives the visual experience of old games with action and fresh gameplay that includes physics. Try to connect as many nodes as you can before chaos occurs. Includes all kinds of exciting sounds and challenges.

Controls

  • WASD: Move the spaceship.
  • Spacebar: Initiate node grab.
  • Enter: Start/Pause game.
This game does not support violence.

Made for the jam "Tu juego a juicio JAM" by Alva Majo.
